aka: Geraldine Page: Stages of a Dream

cast.name: 爱德华·阿尔比 Edward Albee
伊丽莎白·阿什利 Elizabeth Ashley
麦克西维尔·考菲德 Maxwell Caulfield
理查德·张伯伦 Richard Chamberlain
克林特·伊斯特伍德 Clint Eastwood

trans_title: Geraldine Page: Stages of a Dream
introduction: Experience the astonishing journey of actress Geraldine Page who became one of the most dazzling phenomenons of the 20th Century. This stunning documentary reveals the remarkable story a theatrical genius who showed the world just how far we can dream if we have courage to reach for it. On stage, Geraldine's complex characterizations set a new standard of excellence that inspired an entire generation. On screen, she threw away the rule book on what a movie actress should be and wrote her own. Unpredictable. Rebellious. Fearless. Geraldine ignited hope in everyone who has ever wished for something bigger, something better. For the first time, this legend is brought to life, illuminating the authenticity and ambition of an actress who refused to succumb to limitations and proved that true originals don't conform to expectations. They change them. Forever.
